message: Let's be fair and start with a 90/10 split.  This gives you a good starting point, and I'm confident we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
I propose a 50/50 split. It's fair and gives us both a good starting point for the game.

I'm willing to compromise a bit further, but I still believe a 70/30 split is fairer considering the value of the money decreases more for you with each round.  Let's make progress towards a solution.
I'm willing to go up to a 60/40 split in your favor, recognizing the inflation affects me more. Let's meet halfway and avoid further losses.
